channel.title: Can't seem to get Clients to work
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I seem to be unable to get any clients to compile right. Trying to compile with the various scripts included never works, with the error: [code] javac: file not found: src\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options[/code] The script is: [code]@echo off cd C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_05\bin javac -cp lib/clientlibs.jar; -deprecation -d bin -sourcepath src src/*.java pause [/code] - I am on Windows 7.
If I import a client into Eclipse, there are no errors but quite a few warnings. I've only tried this with one client though and I'm not sure what revision it is, sorry.
Also, the moparscape pre-compiled client doesn't work. The web based one just sits on Java loading bar forever, and the client one crashes before the game can fully load. As far as I know all my java is installed correctly...
EDIT: I know there is a sticky for compiler errors but I think my error is outside of the compiler, as the Moparscape ones don't work either.

item.title: Can't seem to get Clients to work
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

set your environmental variables

item.title: Can't seem to get Clients to work
item.dc:creator: @Flenix1 Flenix1
item.description:
@Flenix1 wrote:

Hey guys,

I seem to be unable to get any clients to compile right. Trying to compile with the various scripts included never works, with the error:

javac: file not found: src\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options
The script is:

@echo off cd C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_05\bin javac -cp lib/clientlibs.jar; -deprecation -d bin -sourcepath src src/*.java pause - I am on Windows 7.

If I import a client into Eclipse, there are no errors but quite a few warnings. I’ve only tried this with one client though and I’m not sure what revision it is, sorry.

Also, the moparscape pre-compiled client doesn’t work. The web based one just sits on Java loading bar forever, and the client one crashes before the game can fully load. As far as I know all my java is installed correctly…

EDIT: I know there is a sticky for compiler errors but I think my error is outside of the compiler, as the Moparscape ones don’t work either.

Read full topic
